snippet: President Bashar al-Assad addressed a rally in Damascus, thanking his supporters and pledging to defeat what he said were conspiracies against his country.
abstract: Syria's President Bashar al-Assad addresses a rally in Damascus, thanking his supporters and pledging to defeat what he says are conspiracies against his country; speech appears intended to project confidence even as protests against him persist.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, and Maïa de la Baume from Paris.

lead_paragraph: President Bashar al-Assad addressed a rally in Damascus, thanking his supporters and pledging to defeat what he said were conspiracies against his country.

headline.seo: Assad Vows to Continue Hard Line in Syria
headline.main: In Rare Public Appearance, Assad Addresses Rally in Syria
headline.print_headline: Syria’s President Is Defiant in Rare Public Appearance
